name: ModComponent
description: Modding library for creating new items and integrating elements into TLD.

releases.changes:
updated to work with TLD V1.27
integrated pull request from felipeds, adding support for fire starters, accelerants and blueprint definitions
added support for generic items (like tinder, cloth, etc)
added support for adding items to the radial
added support for new skills (still somewhat rudimental)
added support for reading blueprint definitions from JSON files (similar to gear-spawns)
increased maximum number of servings per food item from 10 to 50
updated template unity project
removed some resource loading patches because that is now handled by AssetLoader

added support for stackable items
added support for burnable items
added early validation of blueprints, so problems occur before the main menu and not in the game
fixed issue with unequipping items during a struggle
fixed issue with gamma value initialization
